attributes.action: All 149,469 people who signed a petition supporting Babar Ahmad should now be arrested and charged with being an accessory to terrorism.
attributes.additional_details: All 149,469 signatories have been proved to have actively supported the activities of a self confessed Islamic terrorist.  To do that is an illegal act for which they should ALL be brought before one of our highest level courts and be put away for a long time.
